attributes.action: Rais taxes on all houses that do not have operating facilities to generate electricity while providing low cost facilities to do this to all houses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you had to pay more tax on a house with out Eco friendly facilities to generate electricity surely you would be more likely to pay the one-off payment than the extra tax?
The Government can then take that extra tax money and put it towards lowering the cost of the necessary facilities to generate electricity and help save the planet Earth.
